body_html: If I understand correctly, the goal of match_filenames_once is that it delegates to matching_files and then saves the result to checkpoints, so the operation only happens once. The documentation doesn't appear to be making any recommendations, so I'm not sure what is actionable here for TensorFlow. If you believe there is a bug in the software or documentation, let me know and I'll re-open this issue.
